page.title: 04A CHILD'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: At seven o'clock in the morning I wake up because my clock radio comes on and I listen to it for half an hour before I get up. When I have dressed I go downstairs and turn on the television to watch "Breakfast Time". At 8.30 a.m. me and my mum set off in the Mini to school. At about 9.30 after assembly we start our proper work which is Maths or English. At 11.50 the boys go into the hall to set up the tables for lunch after that the servers go and set the tables and everybody comes in at 12.00. A good dinner would be Chips, Beans and Meat with Rainbow Sponge and Custard. After dinner we go to play football until 1.00. In the afternoon we use the computer do our Topic, Science, Art, Music or Games.
